title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description:
Revise and expand the project requirements as follows: 
1. Gather and document the project requirements, including features (e.g., adaptive learning, real-time feedback, progress tracking), user personas (beginners, intermediate, advanced programmers, and professionals), learning styles (visual, auditory, kinesthetic), coding challenge types (problem solving, debugging, coding quizzes, and coding practices), integration with existing development platforms (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket), non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, security, accessibility, usability, and the system architecture (frontend, backend, AI component, and database) and the data model. Additionally, consider the need for a feedback mechanism that incorporates user's preferences and learning pace, a feature to track collaboration between users, a method for adapting to new coding languages and frameworks, and an option for user-defined custom challenges. 
2. For each requirement, specify acceptance criteria to ensure that the development team can deliver against the requirements. 
3. Outline the system's monitoring and logging capabilities, focusing on real-time analytics, error reporting, and performance metrics. 
4. Consider integration with popular AI tools (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) for machine learning and natural language processing tasks. 
5. Document any potential risks or challenges associated with the project, along with proposed mitigation strategies.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the coding challenges, mentor interactions, and learning resources.

title: Implement AI Mentor
description: Develop the AI mentor component, including natural language processing, adaptive learning, and code analysis capabilities.

title: Develop Coding Challenge Engine
description: Implement the coding challenge engine, including problem generation, submission handling, and evaluation.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for user data, coding challenges, and mentor interactions.

title: Implement Security and Authentication
description: Develop secure authentication and authorization mechanisms, ensuring data privacy and protection.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance and Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive technical documentation, including user guides, API references, and system architecture diagrams.
